page.title: 16TRANSPORT
page.content:
AREA SOUTH OF WESTWOODSIDE
THERE ARE NO BUS SERVICES IN THIS AREA SO HAVING PRIVATE TRANSPORT IS ESSENTIAL. THERE ARE SCHOOL BUS SERVICES OPERATING FOR COLLECTION LAND DELIVERY DAILY. FOR THOSE FAMILIES LWHO LIVE OFF THE BEATEN TRACK THEY HAVE TO WALK OR RIDE THE DISTANCE FROM HOME TO LTHE PICK_UP POINT. ALTHOUGH THE GAINSBOROUGH TO DONCASTER RAILWAY LINE LRUNS THROUGH THE AREA THERE IS NO BOARDING POINT.
CREDITS RESEARCH AND TEXT BY MEMBERS OF WESTWOODSIDE WOMEN'S INSTITUTE. PHOTOGRAPHY BY MR. J.G. WOOLLEY.
